content: You can head past the small building the other monkey was perched on, or swing around the back side to find a small alternate path. This area leads up to a large column with a green Wisp you can absorb, and two Frozen Corpses guarding it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snowhill_Path_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Snowhill Path Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Frost-Clad Path'.
The content is as follows:
You can head past the small building the other monkey was perched on, or swing around the back side to find a small alternate path. This area leads up to a large column with a green Wisp you can absorb, and two Frozen Corpses guarding it.
